rdf:Description.dc:title: A guide to rights and responsibilities in Alberta workplaces 2008
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Employment and Immigration.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Before the job : learn about pre-hiring rights and obligations ; On the job : find out about pay, time off, overtime and other guidelines ; Leaving the job : get answers about temporary leaves or leaving a job permanently."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Industrial relations
Labor laws and legislation
